pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============Blockchain ETL==============A library to parse the Blockchains that the Switcheo Exchange trades on to collect and track trading analytics.Donations---------Accepted at Neo address **ANwvg4giWPxrZeJtR3ro9TJf4dUHk5wjKe**... _MIT: https://github.com/KeithSSmith/blockchain-etl/blob/master/LICENSE.md
